messages.message: Hey, I'd like better ways to sort/manage apps in Hub. It would be useful if they were ordered as 'most recently used' and if I could favourite or pin apps to stay at the top. There are so many apps in the IB org that I struggle to find ones I've used or made earlier easily (sometimes I can't remember the exact name and there are many similar so search doesn't help - see screenshot)
There is a tab(or pill) which says `Recently used apps`, is that not useful for your case? :sweat_smile:
Oh wow shocked I have missed that - looks ideal
Kind of weird that its buried in the middle of the options though
